attributes.action: General Election with the baring of all current MP.
attributes.background: Call a general election and bar all of the current MP  from stranding again for election. Giving the United Kingdom a fresh set of eyes on brexit.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.

You might like to sign and share this petition instead. 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/249457
